---
title: "Combining data"
author: "Katrina Li"
date: "21/09/2021"
output: html_document
---

```{r combining data}
all <- rbind(a25combine, a41combine, a76combine, a78combine, a79combine, a83combine)

means <- aggregate(react3 ~  context+type, all, mean)

all %>%
  filter(accuracy != 0) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=type, y=react3)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(colour = context), outlier.colour = "black", outlier.shape = 1, position = position_dodge(width=0.9))+
  geom_point(aes(colour = context),position = position_jitterdodge(dodge.width = 0.9),alpha = 0.5) 
```
```{r}
all %>%
  group_by(context, audio, video) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(react3, na.rm = TRUE),quantile50 = quantile(react3,0.5,na.rm = TRUE), count = n())

```
